replies.body: The correct option is Pick Kai'sa yourself and feed
Your allies cannot ruin your games If you ruin them yourself
https://pixel.nymag.com/imgs/daily/selectall/2017/02/09/09-roll-safe.w710.h473.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Ionian Vulpix,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AKMP0N4l,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-12T12:25:51.998+0000)
>
> The correct option is Pick Kai'sa yourself and feed

screw them before they can screw you!

i went kai'sa in ranked my last game.
16/4/6 
but unless its me you get on your team i do highly suggest you dont let anyone on your team play her lol

I went Yasuo in ranked game once and did well. Let me ignore the giant ball of factors that could contribute to that result other than my skill so that I can think it was solely my perfect skill that made me do so well. Suddenly, I am Yasuo god and nobody has right to feel distress when I pick him. Let me go express my perfection with Yasuo into another ga... Yeah 0/20 gg ez report jungler didnt give me blue and caused me to lose lane.

hey, dont be a dick. and also i do really well with kai'sa on average just played another ranked game and was doing well only reason we lost was because my ping decided to spike to 20k causing me to dc and rc over and over and when i  finally got my internet under control just as i reconnected my nexus blew up because my team ffd, tough luck.
HOLY SHIT BETTER STAY AWAY FROM THE 16/4 BRONZE KAI SA

there we go, another low life using a rank as an insult.
the true root of toxicity

As a fellow bronze... dude seriously, you're making us look bad.

Also this is one of those times where rank actually IS relevant.
Not really. If everyone in the game is bronze then you all are equally likely to do poorly.
Is original statement was "unless it's me, dont let your teammate play the champ." so, yes, if youre higher than bronze, rank is relevant here.
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
I mean if you encounter her you're probably bronze too in that case sooo
That comment was _reeaaally_ uncalled for. It doesn't really do anything other than make you look like an asshole.
I know {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
What's with this thing about Yasuo feeding? Is he just really bad right now, or are people trolling with him? The only yas players I've seen, have carried me after winning lane.

Tis' a meme because people always try and play him and be cool.
Then they just do garbage because yasuo requires 2 more brain cells than the average league player in low elo has.

"but unless it's me"

Ooo the narcissism {{champion:432}}
You realize every time you comment you just make it looks worse for you?
i dont give a shit about what a bunch of white boys on the internet  think of me, i said what i needed to say downvote all you like, my statement still stands strong.

oh so it's a racist social outcast
now i see why he's throwing such a childish tantrum, the poor kid

I never understood this logic. Just let them pick Kai'Sa and hope for a good support/jungler. If you leave Kai'Sa unbanned there's a chance your ADC will perform well with her, as opposed to banning your teammates pick intent knowing full well it puts you at a negative disposition to your ally.

That'd be like someone looking up their team's champion mastery and banning anyone who's mastery 3 or below. It's not your job to decide for your team, you need to have faith in these mongrels or you may as well be playing Flex 24/7.

Kai sa was just released, you're telling me that player suddenly forgotten how to play any champion that they used to play before this patch?

This is also ignoring the fact that pick order is a thing and people ban things to prevent letting the enemy team having it.

Leaving it open is fine in normals but in solo queue i don't blame others for banning it.

Your probably going to hate this opinion of mine but i believe that new champions and recently reworked champions should be unbannable in any game mode for 6 days after release, banning them just delays the inevitable point at which you stop banning them and people who haven't been able to play her much start picking her and still losing due to too few games on them.

it also helps you learn to play vs and with that champion and delaying having to learn that by constantly banning said champion is just foolish.
I think it should be in bannable in normals. And pickable in ranked. For a week probably.

You haven't had a Kai'sa like me yet then ;D I love abusing the new champs because I'm pretty quick to learn new champs and others don't know how to play against new champs yet so it helps! (I get your point though I'm probably the only one that uses this logic)

LOL at all these new Kai'Sa mains. 

Stop bragging. Nobody likes it.
Nah dude im g5 im actual garbage at this game. I again just play new champs because nobody at my elo can figure out how to play against them properly.
it's not our job to decide which champ our adc plays, but it is absolutely our right (and my pleasure) to ban champions we don't want on our team regardless of hovers.
there needs to be a third button "norms? ban something worth banning."

> [{quoted}](name=zacktootall,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AKMP0N4l,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-12T05:09:12.687+0000)
>
> there needs to be a third button "norms? ban something worth banning."

who plays draft norms? blind pick for the win

Because I fucking hate facing Xerath in lane. That's why. 

Also because blind pick is kind of a shithole. I say this as someone who played blind pick exclusively for years until DQ was released.
I played exclusively blind pick untill teambuilder. Now I can't go back. The only time I play blind I'd when I have a 5 man que.
i miss teambuilder.. you just picked a champ and went. It was the best. And if you wanted to try a support, queue was .2 seconds

> [{quoted}](name=Kimchi870,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AKMP0N4l,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-12T15:31:36.480+0000)
>
> who plays draft norms? blind pick for the win

Sorry. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} I don't venture into salty wastelands.
i use to only play blind pick but blind pick sucks if you dont call the lane fast enough it is always taken i use to just main "fill" cuz no one would let me get my pick or they would troll

> [{quoted}](name=HeroGilgamesh,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AKMP0N4l,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2018-03-12T23:01:36.042+0000)
>
> i use to only play blind pick but blind pick sucks if you dont call the lane fast enough it is always taken i use to just main "fill" cuz no one would let me get my pick or they would troll

Man...lol calling lanes. That junk so silly. I remember before Dynamic Queue came and people in ranked were literally fighting their own teammates in champ select. Like...teams were losing matches before they even were half way to being started. And when each team only had 3 bans. ROTFL How far League has come...and somehow it's only gotten worse people say. lol
thats why i havent quit yet i see that league just keeps changing and getting better sure there are some bad changes IMO but its mostly gotten better plus i have nothing better to do
Truth. Besides...it's not like the game itself is all that serious. Free to play. No real commitments. Kinda a win-win. Keep fighting the good fight, sir.
Let your ADC pick Kai'Sa, pick Braum, let Jungler camp high-carry midlaner
I'd rather a bronze vayne than a bronze kaisa

Champ selects in 8.5

"someone dodge or i int"

> "someone dodge or i int"

Champ selects in Bronze ever since Dynamic Queue was introduced. The one that always get autofilled as support says this exact line. I kid you not. Every. Time.
honestly if u ban kai'sa and your adc trolls with bot lane teemo or something no matter who they pick it'll be a better champion than kai'sa.
quality meme now I will see you in a few patches when this is done again for next champ/rework

I'd hit the "Let Play and Feed"-button every time.

Feeders are easier to detect by the resident ban bots.
